title: Drawing, ""Century Plant, Agave Americana, Jamaica," West Indies [Yucca]", June 14, 1865
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on cream-colored wove paper
markings: Stamped in ink, at lower center: Lugt 457c
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at lower center:  yellowish tips; again, at bottom right:  stem -  grass green with / a faint bluish bloom / Flowers brilliant and / strong cadmium orange / very full / Century Plant / Agrave Americana / Jamaica June 14th //65; and a detail of the lower part of the stem inscribed with figures, at right center:  2 green stems / 3 green / a little more / yellowish than 2 / 4 light brown / when turned over grayish.
description: Vertical view showing a straight stem growing from a calyx of leaves, and a detail of the lower part of the stem at right center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, ""Century Plant, Agave Americana, Jamaica," West Indies [Yucca]", June 14, 1865.
June 14, 1865. Graphite, brush and white gouache on cream-colored wove paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-20.
